# setValue(_:forButtonElement:)

**Instance Method**

Changes the value of a button element in the virtual controller.

## Declaration

```swift
func setValue(_ value: CGFloat, forButtonElement element: String)
```

## Parameters

- **value**: A value in the range `[-1.0, 1.0]`.
- **element**: The name of the button element to update.

## Discussion

Use this method to update the value of a button element in the virtual controller when you set the [doc://com.apple.gamecontroller/documentation/GameController/GCVirtualController/Configuration/isHidden] property to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] and present your own virtual controller interface.

## Presenting a custom interface

- **setPosition(_:forDirectionPadElement:)**: Changes the value of a directional pad element in the virtual controller.
